content.content:
Dear backersÔºå
We're extremely grateful for your generous pledges on Kickstarter. They were the driving force that got us to reach the target amount. This milestone wouldn't have been possible without you.

Above all, we want to sincerely thank every supporter of our project. Your trust and support have been crucial to our success. You helped us exceed our goal and opened up more opportunities for our project's future.
As a way of thanking our backers, we would like to introduce KickBoost and PlegdeBoost to you.

Once again, we extend our deepest gratitude for your unwavering support. It's because of you that we're able to thrive and continue on this exciting journeyÔºÅ
